name: Bug Off!
description:
Multiplayer bug-on-bug action. Collect body parts and limbs until the timer runs down. Attack your opponent and chop off their limbs using pincers. The player with the most appendages by the end of the game wins!

Controls:

Use two x-input controllers.

Left stick - move forwards and backwards, right stick - move left and right, left bumper - taunt, right bumper - attack.

Made for Fuse Jam 2 by fir3sparkle, binarysudokuart, eveynull and samp20
